Nightshift turns to Lord Elder with a cocked head.

" Watchers?  I gotta be=
 honest with ya Sir, I really don't know who they are.  I've never seen the=
m or met them.  But if I did I'd sure watch my step around them.  Do they h=
ave someth'n ta do with the council?"

Don't be envious of what you don't h=
ave, be grateful for things you already posses.  Nothing is worth more than=
 family and friends.

On Nov 7, 2011, at 5:38 PM, Super Cyclonus <supercycl=
onus@...> wrote:

> > <OLD>
> >
> > Nightshift grins with satisfactio=
n.
> >
> > " Nine lives instead of four tires, gotta love it. Oh yeah, defi=
nitely what
> > I wanted. A bit of swagger and a lotta cattitude . "
> >
> =
> He leaps gracefully onto a chair and takes a seat. His expressions twice =
as
> > playful and vibrant than before.
> >
> > " So, got a game plan for u=
s, huh?"
> 
> <NEW>
> 
> LORD ELDER stood for a moment watching NIGHTSHIFT,=
 taking in his
> antics and his 'swagger', but there was a tense look on hi=
s face as if
> he were waging some internal battle, trying to come to some =
decision.
> 
> Finally he spoke, "Nightshift, I know you re new here to old=
 Earth,
> how much do you know of the Watchers?"
> 
> (TAG)
> 
> Preston
> =


--Apple-Mail-101-949870292

<html><body bgcolor=3D"#FFFFFF"><div>Nightshift turns to Lord Elder with a =
cocked head.</div><div><br></div><div>" Watchers?  I gotta be honest w=
ith ya Sir, I really don't know who they are.  I've never seen them or=
 met them.  But if I did I'd sure watch my step around them.  Do =
they have someth'n ta do with the council?"<br><br>Don't be envious of what=
 you don't have, be grateful for things you already posses.  Nothing i=
s worth more than family and friends.</div><div><br>On Nov 7, 2011, at 5:38=

    <div id=

      <p>> <OLD><br>
><br>
> N=
ightshift grins with satisfaction.<br>
><br>
> " Nine lives instead o=
f four tires, gotta love it.  Oh yeah, definitely what<br>
> I wanted.  =
A bit of swagger and a lotta cattitude . "<br>
><br>
> He leaps grace=
fully onto a chair and takes a seat.  His expressions twice as<br>
> pla=
yful and vibrant than before.<br>
><br>
> " So, got a game plan for u=
s, huh?"<br>
<br>
<NEW><br>
<br>
LORD ELDER stood for a moment watchi=
ng NIGHTSHIFT, taking in his<br>
antics and his 'swagger', but there was a =
tense look on his face as if<br>
he were waging some internal battle, tryin=
g to come to some decision.<br>
<br>
Finally he spoke, "Nightshift, I know =
you re new here to old Earth,<br>
how much do you know of the Watchers?"<br=
>
